name: Ingenious Infants - Math Game & Workouts
description: A fun filled game to train your kid's and also your mathematical skills. With categories like addition, subtraction and multiplication and numerous levels among them, this game is a perfect partner for you to train your brain in playing with numbers. Perform operations on numbers ranging from two to five simultaneously to get an outcome. Play, sharp your brain in math, share it with your friends on Facebook and more! Go on, give your children a great educational game.
